login.welcome_back_please_enter_your_credentia: Welcome back, please enter your credentials
login.no_permission_message: You do not have permission to access the modules
login.you_will_get_insight: You will get insights and metrics on the go, so you can focus on your activity.

register.create_your_account: Create your account to get started
register.name: Full Name
register.name_required: Name must be at least 2 characters
register.must_accept_terms: You must accept the terms and conditions
register.welcome_message: Welcome! Your account has been created.
register.email_already_exists: This email is already registered. Please use a different email or try logging in.

enter-your-email-address-and-well-send-y: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
failed-to-send-reset-link-please-try-aga: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
a-connection-code-will-be-sent-to-your-e: A connection code will be sent to your email address
check-your-inbox-and-follow-the-instruct: Check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
please-check-your-email-and-password: Please check your email and password.
an-error-has-occurred-please-try-again: An error has occurred. Please try again.

errors.imageTooLarge: The image is too large. Please choose an image smaller than 2MB.
errors.invalidImageType: Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, or WebP).
errors.invalidDimensions: The image dimensions are invalid. Please upload an image between 200x200 and 4096x4096 pixels.

network-error.title: Connection issue
network-error.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

timeout.title: Request timed out
timeout.message: The request took too long. Please try again.

not-found.title: Resource not found
not-found.message: The requested item does not exist or has been deleted.

server-error.title: Server error
server-error.message: An internal error occurred. Our team has been notified.

service-unavailable.title: Service unavailable
service-unavailable.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

access-denied.title: Access denied
access-denied.message: You do not have the required permissions for this action.

session-expired.title: Session expired
session-expired.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
